channel.title: How do i place a npc sumwere?

item.title: How do i place a npc sumwere?
item.dc:creator: @smalldude45 smalldude45
item.description:
@smalldude45 wrote:

ok i got how to put the npcs on the game but ima ask 4 more questions… how do u get rid of them?i put to many how do u get them to have hp? and how do u put items in the shop? and how do u get rid of respawning items on the floor?
[br][size=1]Posted on: April 22, 2007, 09:47:40 PM[/size][hr]idk if i can get reported for asking more questions without starting new thread so if i can get reported plz tell me

Read full topic

item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

[quote=“philip_l_g, post:10, topic:83747”][quote author=smalldude45 link=topic=123053.msg1203642#msg1203642 date=1177316541]
can sum1 come to my server? idk if it will work… i dont have hamachi but heres the ip127.0.0.1[br][size=1]Posted on: April 22, 2007, 09:17:47 PM[/size][hr]what do u mean what sorce am i using?
[br][size=1]Posted on: April 22, 2007, 09:19:26 PM[/size][hr]sorry for taking up your guyses time this just seems funner than rs…
[br][size=1]Posted on: April 22, 2007, 09:20:58 PM[/size][hr]err ima log unto morpar for a bit plz still post

[/quote]
Reported for quadruple posting lol[/quote]

There are no rules against double, triple, etc. posting… the only rule is no bumping… And it doesn’t seem like he was bumping, he just wants answers…

item.title: How do i place a npc sumwere?
item.dc:creator: @jessemills1 jessemills1
item.description:
@jessemills1 wrote:

yea say ::npc like i sed befor

then go to your autospawn.cfg and go to bottom of it under [endofspawnlist] and cut the lines unser it and paste it right above [endofspawnlist]
